description:
The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from Nextcloud Server with your computer.

Use the desktop clients to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop.
Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are.
What's Changed
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/input pin title too wide by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8055
- [stable-3.16] use standard way to find the checkum type and really send it to server by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8057
- [stable-3.16] fix Windows build by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8068
- [stable-3.16] use our own craft cache on windows by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8069
- [stable-3.16] gui/macOS: Do not assume accountState will always be valid in socket controller by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8074
- [stable-3.16] gui/macOS: Fix broken file provider domain progress reporting in settings window by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8079
- [stable-3.16] gui/tray: change the status icon background colour again by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8082
- [stable-3.16] set CFBundleDevelopmentRegion to "en" and set CFBundleAllowMixedLocalizations by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8085
- [stable-3.16] gui/macOS: Fix memory issues in Objective-C++ code for FileProvider support by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8089
- [stable-3.16] fix(mac): bump deployment target to 12.0 by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8115
- [stable-3.16] fix(gui): remove ignored file notifications from Activity list by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8116
- [stable-3.16] fix(mac-crafter): Work around broken consecutive shell integration builds by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8117
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/delete errors by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8124
- [stable-3.16] remove costly availability check that is never used by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8123
- [stable-3.16] fix crash within FolderStatusModelTest by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8125
- [stable-3.16] fix: move array to correct value in dict by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8126
- [stable-3.16] remove bogus check that tried to check for existing case clash conflict by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8129
- [stable-3.16] stop using QFile api to delete a single local file by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8130
- [stable-3.16] fix: try to correct mtime on upsyncs by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8131
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/use newer bulk upload checksum header by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8137
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/slow bulk upload by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8139
- [stable-3.16] disable use of bulk upload for small files by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8141
- [stable-3.16] simplify deletions of invalid read-only items: do not interrupt sync by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8153
- [stable-3.16] fix(PinState): don't trigger sync when file's PinState changed to Unspecified. by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8157
- [stable-3.16] skip single test or whole test file for macOS: they are broken by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8163
- [stable-3.16] Exclude NavigationPaneHelper from non-Windows compile by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8158
- [stable-3.16] Use AccountPtr in Account signals instead of raw pointer by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8159
- [stable-3.16] fix(theme): correct dark/light mode check on Win10 by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8162
- [stable-3.16] fix(msi): allow custom installation directory by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8166
- [stable-3.16] fix(migration): import proxy and general settings from legacy config. by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8169
- [stable-3.16] use specific revision for KDE blueprints that matches the craft cache by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8172
Full Changelog: nextcloud/desktop@v3.16.2...v3.16.3
